alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 5:01AM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times, decreasing later this morning. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph, leading to areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Eagar-Springerville, Forest Lakes and Heber-Overgaard. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 4 AM Today to 11 AM Today: Eagar-Sprgrvlle 1 to 3 inches Forest Lakes 1 to 2 inches Heber-Overgaard 1 to 2 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County
